column1: Little Goat Diner////Dishes are quite big here
column2: so don't do like we did and order 3 things to share
column3: it's just way way too much.  My hubby loved his Goat Melt
column4: and I loved my Korean Bi Bim Bop on cauliflower rice
column5: and washed it down with a Bloody Mary.  I think we both ate half our dishes and were stuffed
column6: but yet our 3rd item came out lol.  Jessica G. insisted I order the crumpets
column8: no way we would have had room!
